overview: How do you like your bear sex? How about spontaneous and a little taboo. Like fucking your real estate agent as he shows you a house. The house isn’t the only thing wide open. Maybe you’re more the come over and let’s watch TV and chill, which is code for take my huge cock while you have your face stuffed in the couch kind of bear. How do you feel about food with sex? I bet you’re the feed you a whipped creamed banana before I fuck you all over the kitchen and make you work the cream out of my banana type. I like the anonymous fuck myself. Where I text you to come over and fuck my brains out, and you do just that without me even seeing your face. Well, you’re in luck because you get all of that with Angel Ferrari, Dale Savage, Parker Logan, Atlas Grant, Brad Kalvo, Kosher Pig, Emmett Frost, and John Pucker on Bear Buddies. Beautiful bears of all types, kissing, sucking, rimming, and fucking while you sit back with your dick out, enjoying the show.
title: Bear Buddies 1
